docs.text: Callbacks There are totally 14 different callback locations defined in events.py . It is important to set the priorities for each callback to ensure the correct order of execution. Also, we need to make a standard for the priorities for clarity. Priority Range Standard We first define the range of priorities that can be used: System Level Priority: 100 - 200 User Level Priority: 0 - 100 Default Callbacks Priorities Events.INITIALIZE priority checkpoint.setup_checkpointer 199 checkpoint.search_checkpointer 195 logging.report_init_config 100 Events.TRAIN_BEGIN priority train.configure_distributed 199 logging.setup_logging 195 train.configure_optimizer 190 train.configure_ray 180 train.configure_dataloader 175 checkpoint.load_trainer_counts 170 train.configure_variables 165 checkpoint.setup_saving_variables 160 logging.setup_timer 155 train.setup_model 150 train.configure_scheduler 145 logging.setup_tensorboard 140 checkpoint.load_states 130
